programme.title: The Red Rope
programme.desc: Hired killers and Old West outlaws stand front and center in this riveting tale from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Bob Steele, one of the busiest stars in movie history (everything from the silent era to Republic Pictures to working with Clint Eastwood in Hang Em High) is here as Tom Shaw, the target of a bad mans desperation and hate. Steele appeared in more than 240 movies and television shows, but was never more impressive than in The Red Rope.

programme.title: Brand of the Devil
programme.desc: The Texas Rangers tangle with a band of dangerous rustlers in this two-fisted production from Hollywood's Poverty Row. Starring Dave O'Brien, Kermit Maynard, and Guy Wilkerson, with direction by low-budget ace Harry L. Fraser.

programme.title: Springtime in the Sierras
programme.desc: Ads for this Roy Rogers classic roared HEAD FOR THE MUSICAL HILLS...ROY IS GUNNIN' FOR THRILLS! And thrills are what you'll get when you watch this fun, action packed B-Western from Republic Pictures. There's some great comic relief from Andy Devine and Chester Conklin, two of Hollywood's all-time greats. This old-fashioned shoot-'em-up was directed by William Witney, who would go on to direct many of television's top western sagas, including Bonanza, Wagon Train, and The Wild, Wild West.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Stoney and the son of the local Indian chief are attacked while escorting a gold shipment meant for the tribe. The nuggets are stolen, the Indian killed and Stoney is arrested for the murder and theft. With his partner in jail, Pat endeavors to learn who is behind the robbery and the previous thefts of tools and supplies meant for the Indians before the tribe returns to the warpath to avenge the death of their kinsman.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: In an episode called, Spring the Trap, desperado Lew Danning hid his stolen loot before dying. Pat disguises himself as the outlaw and slips into a lawless border town to gather clues from Lasker's gang of thieves. Suddenly Danning's sister shows up looking for her brother. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Kate hires Herby to work as an assistant manager at the hotel, causing Uncle Joe to fear for his position. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe tries to advertise Shady Rest as a hotel for honeymooners.But is Hooterville really the best place for a honeymoon? Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco tries to help a beautiful woman prove that her brother is innocent after he's arrested for murder.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode first aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A rancher is shot dead after discovering oil on his property. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog..The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951 .It was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Matt and Frankie meet the Wild Bunch and their jovial leader Butch Cassidy.Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Also starring Joe Sawyer, Slim Pickens, Lane Chandler, and Bob Carney. Directed by William Witney. Episode originally aired in 1954. Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White. Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Jim Davis stars as Matt Clark, a railroad detective who is investigating a railroad holdup. Starring Mary Castle. Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954.Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White. Series won an Emmy in 1955. (This episode also features James Best (1926-2015), who would go on to appear on such shows as The Andy Griffith Show, Bonanza, and The Dukes of Hazzard.).

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West.In this episode, Judge Bean suspects that Doc Malone's Medicine Show may be harboring a notorious killer. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, an infamous and dangerous train robber escapes from prison, and the Judge sets out to capture him and send him back. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie is on the case when homesteaders are forced to sell their land for cheap due to suspicious circumstances. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Tagg Oakley finds himself in trouble after being tricked into driving a wagon full of gunpowder to Fort Yuma, unaware that Geronimo and his Apache braves are waiting for the wagon to pass. Realizing Tagg is in danger, Annie and Lofty race to the rescue. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: A town starts to believe they are being cursed by a witch after a series of strange occurences. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook help a Medicine Man who has been driven out of his tribe. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: With Tom Edwards ranch going to waste since his becoming a paraplegic following an accident with Ben, Ben makes a business proposition: The Cartwrights will build a mill on Edwards land. In return, Ben requests that he earn his investment money back as well as fifteen percent. The deal is made, but suspicions of Edwards accident bring tension to Ponderosa and put their agreement at risk.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Leather Burners
programme.desc: Hopalong Cassidy (William Boyd) gets the call when a herd of rustled cattle mysteriously disappear. Andy Clyde, Victor Jory and George Reeves (televisions Superman!) also star in this, the 42nd of 66 Hopalong Cassidy features. If you look closely, you might even notice Robert Mitchum in an uncredited role.

programme.title: Grand Canyon Trail
programme.desc: Roy Rogers and Trigger star in this Republic Pictures feature about the hunt for silver in a deserted ghost town. Songs include 'Colorado Joe' and 'Everything's Going My Way'. Plus, look for Andy Devine as Cookie Bullfincher. Film buffs should look for silent screen foil James Finlayson, a familiar face from various Keystone Cop comedies, as the local sheriff.

programme.title: Mohawk
programme.desc: Kurt Neumann (The Fly, Rocketship X-M) directed this bawdy tale of a love that was louder than war drums! With a cast that includes Scott Brady, Rita Gam, and Neville Brand, the story takes place on a remote army post where an artist romances a trio of women, just as a vengeful settler turns the army and the local Iroquois tribe against each other. Film buffs might like to know that the cinematography for this feature is by four-time Oscar nominee Karl Struss, who won an Academy Award in 1929 for his work on Sunrise.

programme.title: Captain Apache (Edited Version)
programme.desc: After Harry T. Collier, a beloved commissioner of Indian Affairs, is murdered in late March during the1880s, Captain Apache, an Indian graduate of West Point, is assigned by the army to investigate the crime. Suspecting that O.J., the sheriff of a town bordering the reservation may be involved in the killing, Apache travels there and finds the sheriff dining with his mistress Maude at the Paradise Saloon. Before Apache can question him, however, O.J. abruptly departs and rides out of town with Apache in pursuit. When Apache apprehends him, O.J. swears that he did not kill Collier and relates that the agents dying words were April Morning. Meanwhile, Griffin, a wealthy landowner and six of..

programme.title: Sagebrush Trail
programme.desc: John Wayne plays a man wrongly convicted of murder in this exciting western drama from Lone Star Pictures. You'll enjoy plenty of gun action and thundering hoofbeats as he escapes from jail and then joins a gang, hoping to find the real killer! Director Armand Schaefer (The Miracle Rider, The Lost Jungle) whips up some fine performances from a cast of B-movie favorites, including Lane Chandler (Samson and Delilah) and the great stunt rider, Yakima Canutt. And of course, the film features plenty of fight scenes, made memorable by John Wayne's big swinging' right fist! For film buffs: This was one of 11 films Wayne starred in that year, making 1933 one of the busiest years of Wayne's..

programme.title: The Kansan
programme.desc: Richard Dix stars in this epic of the boisterous and brawling Old West! Wounded in a gun battle with the notorious James gang, John Bonniwell (Dix) wakes up in the hospital to find out hes been elected marshal! He quickly learns that this hot-headed frontier town can only be cooled off with blazing lead and dynamite! Jane Wyatt, Albert Dekker, Victor Jory, and Robert Armstrong also star in this tale of smashing fists and crashing bullets from director George Archainbaud (The Lost Squadron).

programme.title: Adventures of Gallant Bess
programme.desc: Rather than a gorgeous Hollywood starlet, actor Cameron Mitchell (Carousel), playing cowboy Ted Daniels, shares the screen in this film with a magnificent wild horse named Gallant Bess, who he tames, trains and keeps for himself. But after Ted is gravely injured in a fixed rodeo, Bess is stolen away from him and forced to join a cruel traveling carnival in this fast-paced western from director Lew Landers (The Adventures of Rin Tin Tin).

programme.title: Lost Canyon
programme.desc: When Johnny Travers (Jay Kirby) is falsely accused of robbing a bank, it's up to Hopalong Cassidy (William Boyd) to clear his name and find the real villains. There's nothing better than watching Hoppy get rough with the rustlers, and it's all the better when you get to hear the Sportsmen Quartette sing (I got Spurs) Jingle, Jangle, Jingle.

programme.title: Law of the Pampas
programme.desc: Murder below the Equator...and Hopalong Cassidy races to action in the heart of the wild Pampas country !Hoppy (William Boyd) and his pal Lucky (Russell Hayden) head to South America to look after a herd of cattle sold by Cassidy's boss to an Argentine rancher. Unfortunately, the scoundrel Ralph Merritt (Sidney Blackmer) wants the cattle, and he's not above hiring some dangerous characters to do his dirty work. It's a test of blazing guns...under a blazing sun! Can the boys of Bar 20 lay down the law in a lawless place like the Pampas? Can Hoppy and his gang succeed in what is truly a last frontier? Watch and see.

programme.title: Mason of the Mounted
programme.desc: Canadian Mountie Mason is sent south of the border to look for a horse thief with only a watch chain for evidence. He befriends young Andy and when Calhoun hits Andy, Mason and Calhoun fight. In the scuffle Calhoun's watch with the missing chain is dislodged. Mason then sets out to bring in Calhoun and his gang.

programme.title: With Sitting Bull at the Spirit Lake Massacre
programme.desc: A long-thought-lost film finally surfaces after being unseen for over eight decades. Created and copyrighted by Sunset Productions in 1925 but not released until June 15, 1927, this silent epic features the superior Native American actor Chief Yowlachie (performing here under the name Chief Yowlache) as Sitting Bull. Other fine actors in the cast include the always popular Bryant Washburn and a young Bob Steele, who appears under his real name Bob Bradbury Jr. The story takes place in the 1860s or 1870s near Spirit Lake, Iowa. Settlements of whites are growing in that region but the Sioux Indians also have professed their interest in one such settlement. Chief Sitting Bull surveys the..

programme.title: Broadway to Cheyenne
programme.desc: A gang of big-city thugs trying to set up a protection racket out west meet their match in this B-Western from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Rex Bell, billed on the old print ads as The heroic idol of young America! stars as Breezy Kildare, a New York detective who happens to be in Wyoming. When Breezy leads a group of cattleman against the well-armed city boys, the bad guys will wish theyd stayed in New York! The rest of the cast includes such favorites from the period as George Gabby Hayes, Roy DArcy, and Marceline Day. (Day worked opposite everyone from John Wayne to Buster Keaton, but retired from acting shortly after this movie at age 25.) Directed by Harry L. Fraser.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: In this episode, the scourge of the Southwest is a ruthless and devious killer known as the Sidewinder. When a hapless Cavalryman escorting the criminal falls victim to his tricks, Pat and Sonny set out to track him down and bring him in. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. This episode, Stolen Dynamite, stars Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan. In this episode, the G-men nab a beautiful spy.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: A Night at the Hooterville Hilton
programme.desc: Upon reading a fantastical brochure Uncle Joe made, a hotel critic comes to Shady Rest. Can Hooterville live up to Joe's hype? Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Homer Bedloe (Charles Lane) threatens to close down the Cannonball on Christmas Eve, disrupting the Shady Rest hotel's holiday plans. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Directed by Guy Scarpita. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: An ex-con is released from prison seeking vengeance against those who put him there. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode first aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho work to uncover a cattle rustling operation.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog..The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951. This episode aired in 1950. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detective Matt Clark discovers the hideout of the famous Doolin gang. Clark, along with Detective Frankie, work to infiltrate the hideout and bring the Doolin gang to justice.Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White. Directed by William Witney. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle, along with Leo Gordon, Joan Shawlee, Don Kennedy, Kenneth MacDoNald, Patrick Waltz, and Ken Chryson. First aired in 1954.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detectives Matt and Frankie work to save a young man from a hangman's noose in New Mexico.Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle, along with Miachael Hall, Mitchell Kowall, and Jean Inness. Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954.Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White.Series won an Emmy in 1955. (This episode features the beloved character actor Jack Elam as Black Jack Ketchum.).

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: In this episode, Mr. Kenyon and his children stumble upon a cache of gunpowder in an abandoned cabin. They take the news to Judge Bean angering Holman who plans on handing the explosives to the hostile Mescaleros. The lawmen must keep it from happening. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, Doc resorts to drastic measures as he desperately seeks money to fund his free public clinic. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie writes to the son of an old female pedlar, unaware that he is a member of an outlaw gang, now on their way to Diablo. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Also starring Slim Pickens. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: The Saga of Clement O' Toole
programme.desc: Mistaken for a notorious outlaw, a young man struggles to convince the townspeople that he didnt commit a stagecoach robbery. Initially, Annie and Susan Meriwether believe him, but his innocence comes into question when he is present during a bank robbery in which the outlaws seem to recognize him. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook come across a girl in the woods who is running away from a man named Stark. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook help an old woman find her son who has been missing for 18 years.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Adam tags along with a wagon train of Quakers passing through town as he is interested in the leaders daughter. Someone, however, intends to take the gold being carried in the wagon train, putting everyone in danger.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Crashing Thru
programme.desc: Down the danger trail sweeps a crimson fury... as Renfrew rides again! In this action-packed adventure, Sgt. Renfrew must face off against a group of criminals involved in a gold robbery. With his partner, Constable Kelly, wounded in a gunfight, Renfrew must stop the thieves on his own. Directed by Elmer Clifton; starring James Newill and Warren Hull, this is one adventure you won't want to miss.

programme.title: Frontier Justice
programme.desc: Hoot Gibson is back! But he never imagined he'd find his father in an insane asylum and his cattle ranch overrun with sheep! Worst of all, Roger Williams stars as the diabolical James WIlton, a rival who isn't above murder. For trivia buffs: Director Robert F. McGowan was the man behind several of the classic Our Gang comedies..

programme.title: Arizona Bound
programme.desc: The Rough Riders are called upon to help save a stagecoach line. From 1941, starring Buck Jones and Tim McCoy, plus Horace Murphy and Luana Walters. Directed by Spencer Bennett.

programme.title: Tumbleweeds
programme.desc: The great William S. Hart stars in this classic tale of settlers in the Oklahoma territory. Directed by King Baggot, one of the most versatile movie figures of the silent era, this movie is not only history recorded in heart throbs, as the original print ads boasted, but shows us why Hart is considered by some to be the top western actor of them all. Hart, who directed many of his own films, also had a hand in directing this feature, which turned out to be his last starring role.

programme.title: Enemy of the Law
programme.desc: Tex Ritter stars in this western drama about a man who goes undercover to befriend a convict believed to have stolen a shipment of government gold. Also starring Guy Wilkerson as Panhandle Perkins, this offering from Hollywoods Poverty Row features the usual fistfights and entertaining storyline that made these modestly budgeted features well worth watching. Songs include Teach Me To Forget and You Will Have to Pay both sung by Tex.

programme.title: The Dawn Rider
programme.desc: John Wayne was still a few years from major stardom when he appeared as John Mason, a man seeking revenge for his fathers murder. Marion Burns stars as Alice, Masons love interest, while Reed Howes stars as Masons friend and rival for Alices affection. When Mason finally tracks down the man responsible for his fathers death, will Ben help, or stand in his way? Produced by Lone Star Pictures, the group behind many of Waynes early films, The Dawn Rider is a stirring yarn about the price of vengeance.

programme.title: The Outlaw
programme.desc: Billy the Kid, Pat Garrett, and Doc Holliday ride again in Howard Hughes' epic 1943 western, but the character you'll remember most is sultry country vixen Rio McDonald. Hughes' nationwide search for an actress to play Rio resulted in the film debut of Jane Russell, whose natural assets were allegedly helped by a special bra designed by Hughes. When The Outlaw finally received a nationwide release in 1946, its success vindicated Hughes and made Russell a star. As for Hughes' infamous bra, Russell said in her 1988 memoir, I never wore it, and he never knew.

programme.title: Rage at Dawn
programme.desc: Randolph Scott plays James Barlow, an agent from Chicago hired to bring the notorious Reno brothers to justice. But wouldnt you know it? The Reno gang includes a beautiful young woman (Mala Powers), who catches Barlows eye. This western from director Tim Whelan (The Thief of Bagdad) features cinematography by two-time Oscar winner Ray Rennahan (Gone With The Wind), while the screenplay was by noted author Horace McCoy (They Shoot Horses, Dont They?). Theres also an all-star cast, including Forrest Tucker, J. Carrol Naish, Edgar Buchanan, Denver Pyle, and several other shaggy sidewinders.

programme.title: The Terror of Tiny Town
programme.desc: Some incredibly small actors were hired to star in this peculiar cult film. It's all about the villainous Bat Haines (Little Billy Rhodes), who is wreaking havoc on Tiny Town. Can Buck Lawson (Billy Curtis) and the townspeople band together and drive him away? This oddity, which was originally distributed by Columbia Pictures, was directed by one of the most prolific low budget filmmakers in Hollywood history, Sam Newfield, a man with over 200 movies to his credit. While it has appeared on many Worst of all time lists, it deserves to be seen at least once.

programme.title: Ridin' the Lone Trail
programme.desc: Sam Newfield directs this Western about a group of outlaws who are robbing stagecoaches while being led by a mysterious outlaw on a beautiful white horse. Bob McArthur (Bob Steele) arrives to help and makes a shocking discovery when he follows the white horse to the outlaws hideout. This B-Western, one of a long line of Sam Newfield efforts, also stars Claire Rochelle and Charles King (who has over 400 acting credits to his name, beginning with The Birth of a Nation in 1915 and ending in 1957 (his death).

programme.title: Hellgate (Edited Version)
programme.desc: In 1867 Kansas, veterinarian Sterling Hayden treats an injured stranger who turns out to have been a guerrilla raider--and Hayden soon finds himself serving a term in one of the world's most terrifying prisons under sadistic commandant Ward Bond. Adapted from the story of Dr. Mudd, the physician who attended John Wilkes Booth, assassin of President Lincoln.

programme.title: Born to Battle
programme.desc: Cyclone Tom Saunders starts a ruckus in a Chinese laundry and has to go before a judge. Unable to pay his fine, he is bailed out by a local cattle rancher and agrees to do 30 days' work for him. It's not too long before he becomes enmeshed in a war between rustlers and outlaws.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are ordered to Nugget City to tear down a toll-gate on federal land. They are opposed by a woman mayor who uses the gate to keep out riff-raff and raise money for the town's growing needs. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are sent to Texas when it is discovered that a large number of Federal Gold Bonds held by the State of Texas are counterfeit. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: When Herby (Don Washbrook) gets drafted, Kate tries to cheer him up by saying he could become an astronaut. Could hooterville actually send someone ito the space program? Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Bobbie Jo falls head over heals for an edgy young poet from New York. He likes her, too, but he's not fond of Hooterville. Of coure, Kate has to show Bobby Jo what this pompous fool is all about. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963. Look for Dennis Hopper as the beatnik.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho investigate when a railway detective is found dead.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode first aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho protect a man being chased by outlaws who believe he is responsible for a gold robbery. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Matt and Frankie investigate a cattle dispute in Wyoming. When evidence starts to add up, it leads them to Matt's old friend Tom Horn.Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Also sarring Louis Jean Heydt, Harry Woods, Michael Whalen, Stanley Andrews, and Walter Coy. Directed by William Witney. Produced by B movie veteran Edward White. Episode first aired in 1954.Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detective Matt Clark goes undercover working at a gambling den. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Directed by William Witney. Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White. Episode first aired in 1954.Series won an Emmy in 1955. Also starring Dick SImmons, Claire Carleton, Mauritz Hugo, Howard Wright, and Douglas Evans.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, the judge learns of a scheme to smuggle guns and ammo to the Indians, and he encounters an unlikely pair of allies in his plan to break it up: an organ grinder and his monkey. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, the Judge and Jeff take on the richest man in the valley over water rights. Though the rich villain has ensnared young Hugh in outlaw ways, the lawmen are determined to set Hugh on a better path. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: With the sheriff off looking for an outlaw, a fake sheriff takes his place, leading to a senseless murder. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This enetertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Waiting to hear whether or not gold has been struck in the mine, Annie discovers a beloved stagecoach is being driven by the daughter of the owner, whos threatening to sell the stage so he can pocket the money. When word comes back that there is no gold in the money, Annie becomes suspicious and begins investigating. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook help the long-lost son of a Cree tribal chief.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingacchook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook go undercover as managers of a trading post. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Retired U.S. Deputy Marshall Denver McKee struggles to find the suspects responsible for stolen cattle and murdered ranchers.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Prairie Pals
programme.desc: IT'S A MODERN GOLD RUSH GANGSTER STYLE! But Three Ridin' Singin' Fightin' Buckaroos Stop 'Em Cold! The Prairie Pals are on the lookout for Wainwright, a scientist who has gone missing after discovering a way to turn vanadium ore into gold. The Prairie Pals start their search at Hank Stoners land, where the vanadium ore can be found. Directed by Sam Newfield; starring Bill Cowboy Rambler Boyd, Art Davis, and Lee Powell.

programme.title: Sunset Carson Rides Again
programme.desc: Sunset Carson is trying to raise money for a new school and his partner Sam Webster is out to stop him. When Carson plans a benefit prize-fight, Webster plans to make off with the proceeds. Direted by Oliver Drake; starring Sunset Carson, Al Terry, Pat Starling, Ron Ormond, Joe Hiser.

programme.title: Days of Jesse James
programme.desc: Famed American western actor and singer Roy Rogers once again plays himself in this Jesse James tale that's a twist on the familiar formula. When he is summoned to bring Jesse to justice after the known villain is suspected of a bank robbery, Rogers soon discovers that Jesse has been framed and that the owner of the bank has robbed his own bank posing as Jesse. Fast-paced and fun, this classic Roy Rogers western directed by Joseph Kane (Dakota) features a whole host of original songs sung by the great Rogers himself.

programme.title: Rawhide
programme.desc: Baseball superstar Gehrig is one of several ranchers being coerced by a bunch of bandits. His sister and her lawyer/lover organize the ranchers. Directed by Ray Taylor; starring Smith Ballew, Gehrig, Evelyn Knapp. Talk about stunt casting! Gehrig was a New York Yankees star who was nearing the end of his career, but one of the biggest sports stars in the country. In the movie he plays a variation of himself, as Lou Gehrig, a retired baseball player who takes up ranching. Lou expects to relax on his ranch but quickly joins other ranchers in a fight to protect their properties.

programme.title: The Hanged Man
programme.desc: After a condemned gunfighter (Steve Forrest) survives his own hanging, he helps a young widow stop a pitiless land baron from taking her ranch. This television feature boasts a strong cast of recognizable characters, including Will Geer, Sharon Acker, Dean Jagger, BarBara Luna, and Cameron Mitchell. Director Michael Caffey would go on to work on such hit shows as Barnaby Jones and MacGyver. Also, look for John Mitchum, younger brother of Robert, in a small role. This movie originally aired on ABC-TV and was considered the pilot for a possible series. Writer/producer Andrew Fenady was behind several opular TV shows such as Branded and The Rebel, as well as the 1970 John Wayne feature, Chisum.

programme.title: McLintock
programme.desc: He likes his whiskey hard... His women soft... And his west all to himself! Inspired by Shakespeares The Taming of the Shrew (1594), John Wayne (The Searchers, Stagecoach), Maureen OHara (Miracle on 34th Street, The Parent Trap), and Patrick Wayne (The Searchers, The Alamo) star in this western comedy directed by Andrew V. McLaglen (Gunsmoke, The Wild Geese). George Washington McLintock (John Wayne) is the wealthiest man in his territory who utilizes his power and influence to maintain order between farmers, ranchers, Indians, corrupt government officials, and his own family! McLintock is McNificent.

programme.title: Courageous Avenger
programme.desc: Gold, gangs, and the heroic fight for life! Johnny Mack Brown (Billy the Kid, Coquette) stars in this western thriller about murders going on in a mining community. Its a story full of twists, where the greed for gold is only surpassed by the struggle for life.

programme.title: Vengeance Valley
programme.desc: The sons of a Colorado cattle baron, one biological and the other adopted, resent one another and fight for control of their father's cattle empire.

programme.title: Fugitive of the Plains
programme.desc: In this continuation of the much loved Billy the Kid serials featuring dreamboat Buster Crabbe (perhaps best known for his numerous appearances as Flash Gordon in the 30s and 40s), Billy finds himself joining an outlaw band led by women in order to, once again, clear his name after being wrongly accused of a crime he did not commit. Helmed by famed B-movie director Sam Newfield, this film also features Al St. John, whose lovable Fuzzy character was as essential to the PRC's Billy the Kid series as Billy himself.

programme.title: Fighting Fury
programme.desc: A THRILLING TALE OF REVENGE AND REDEMPTION! Based on the story Triple Cross for Danger by the widely lauded Western author Walter J. Coburn, Fighting Fury is a thrilling take on the Western revenge drama. Portraying both a father and his son, star of silent and sound cowboy adventure films, Jack Hoxie (Trouble Busters, Law and Lawless) exudes the classic American rustic charm that still defines the genre. The film spins the yarn of Clay Hill Jr. (Hoxie), a Spanish-American boy raised by a Mexican servant who vows bloody vengeance on three malicious ranchers after they murder his parents and turn his life upside down. Featuring fine supporting performances from genre heavies Helen Holmes,..

programme.title: Phantom Ranger
programme.desc: Cowboy hero Tim McCoy stars as Tim Hayes, a two-fisted G-Man working for the FBI on a counterfeit money case. The incredibly daring Hayes infiltrates a gang that has kidnapped a Treasury Department engraver. Under the direction of Poverty Row icon Sam Newfield, McCoy turns in another of his legendary slam-bang performances, making Phantom Ranger a perennial favorite of B-Western fans.

programme.title: Raiders of the Border
programme.desc: U.S. Marshal Nevada Jack McKenzie (Johnny Mack Brown) and Sandy Hopkins (Raymond Hatton) go undercover to catch jewelry smugglers in this vintage western from Monogram Pictures. This was one of the last films directed by John P. McCarthy (Song of the Gringo, The Oklahoma Cyclone), while Johnny Mack Brown would go on to find great success as Nevada Jack; this was the fourth of 19 films where he played the crime busting marshal.

programme.title: Neath Canadian Skies
programme.desc: It's the mounties versus claim jumpers in this drama from Golden Gate Pictures. Based on an action-packed novel by James Oliver Curwood and directed by B. Reeves Maynard (Undersea Kingdom, The Phantom Empire), the film features an outstanding cast of Poverty Row regulars, including Russell Hayden, Inez Cooper, Cliff Nazarro, I. Stanford Jolley, and Kermit Maynard. For movie buffs: Cinematographer Marcel Le Picard began his career in the silent era and finished with exactly 200 credits.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan. In Ghost Bushwackers, the G-Men are authorized by the Army to do undercover work in the lawless Arizona territory.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan. In this episode, the G-Men seek out stolen gold.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: The family wants Billie Jo to become a doctor, but she wants to go to Hollywood to become an actress. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. And be sure to look for Adam West in a pre-Batman role as Doctor Clayton Harris. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in January, 1964.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Billie Jo recieves an endowment, but instead of using it for medical school, she wishes to go to Hollywood.Kate meets with Judge Drucker to see if she can legally prevent the girl from goinng. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho break a woman out of prison before she is hanged for murder.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog.. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A town blames the son-in-law of a the bank president for his murder. Cisco and Pancho work to uncover the truth before the townspeople hang the man. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. This episode aired in 1950. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detective Frankie is shot during a robbery. Her life becomes in danger when her doctor is kidnapped by the murderous outlaw Clay Allison.Starring Jim Davis, Mary Castle, Jack Kelly, Paul Farber, Frank Fenton, and Fred Sherman.Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954. Produced by B movie veteran Edward White. Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: A railroad detective pursues the infamous female outlaw, Belle Starr, after a herd of horses are stolen from the U.S. Calvalry. This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955.. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Belle Starr is played by Mary Windsor. Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, Jeff Taggert's brother is accused of robbing the Del Rio bank. While investigating the case, Jeff is implicated in the hold up. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Sheriff Blade arrives from Comstock to arrest rancher Del Randall, but the Judge thinks the charges are trumped up. Bean and Taggart put Del in jail for safety while they investigate Blade's connection to suspiciously wealthy Mendenhall. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: After a jailed Dobie escapes from jail, Dobie and Tagg find themselves kidnapped, forcing a desperate Annie to rescue her brother. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie tries to help a blind girl find her father's killer. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Directed by Robert G. Walker. Also starring Judy Nugent, Forrest Taylor, and Denver Pyle. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: A trader ignites a war between the Hurons and the settlers. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: After a long winter, the Tuscarora tribe struggles for survival. Hawkeye and Chingachcook set out to help.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingacchook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben Cartwright gives a strip of fertile farming land to an Indian who had previously saved Bens life. Things take a deadly turn, however, when the land ends up being next to a very racist farmer.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Wagon Wheels
programme.desc: Randolph Scott (Ride the High Country) stars as Clint Belmet, the leader of a wagon train on the way to Oregon. Along the route he and his crew deal with various hardships, including Indian attacks and a fellow named Murdock (Monte Blue) who is out to stop them at any cost. With a cast that includes the likes of Gail Patrick and Billy Lee, this adventure saga was based on a novel by the western master, Zane Grey (Riders of the Purple Sage, Fighting Caravans). Trivia note: The film's original title was Caravans West.

programme.title: I'm From Arkansas
programme.desc: Welcome to Pitchfork, Arkansas, where proud farmer Juniper Jenkins is celebrating his prize hog Esmeralda giving birth to 18 piglets. The event attracts many tourists and real life country musicians to Pitchfork, including Mary Ford, Merle Travis, Jimmy Wakely, and countless others. How the smalltown folks react to all of the hubbub is a formula for comedy. Starring as Farmer Jenkins is Slim Summerville, a former Keystone Cop who became one of Hollywood's most reliable journeyman, appearing in everything from Charlie Chan and Shirley Temple movies, to the classic All Quiet on the Western Front. Also starring Bruce Bennett Maude Eburne, Cliff Nazarro, Al St. John, Arthur Q. Bryan, and..

programme.title: Hands Across The Border
programme.desc: Roy Rogers and Trigger star in this Republic Pictures western about horse breeders vying for a contract with the U.S. Army. The cast also includes such favorites as Onslow Stevens and Guinn Big Boy Williams, while songs include Hey Hey (It's a Great Day), Dreaming to Music, and The Girl with the High Button Shoes. For movie buffs: The music for the title song, Hands Across the Border, was composed by none other than Hoagy Carmichael.

programme.title: Daniel Boone
programme.desc: In 1775, Daniel Boone (George O'Brien) leads thirty colonial families to Kentucky where they face the threats of Native American marauders led by rebel Simon Girty (John Carradine). That's just the beginning, for there are even more dangers and clashes ahead for Boone and his party. With a cast that includes Ralph Forbes, Heather Angel, and lovable child star Dickie Jones, director David Howard takes us through one of the most exciting periods in American history.

programme.title: Way of the West
programme.desc: Government agent Gordon (Hal Taliaferro) goes undercover to investigate an ongoing war between cattlemen and sheepmen. But he soon finds himself framed for murder! This low budget western from the short-lived Empire Pictures is from the golden era of shoot em ups, when audiences knew who the bad guys were, and couldnt wait for the good guys to serve up some just punishment.

programme.title: Riders of Destiny
programme.desc: John Wayne sings! Well, not really. His voice was dubbed here, but as Singin Sandy Saunders hes still able to write the code of justice with a blazing sixgun! Hes a government agent out to help a group of ranchers in their battle with a villain who is tying up local water rights. Also starring Gabby Hayes, Al St. John, Yakima Canutt, and Cecilia Parker, Riders of Destiny was filmed early in Waynes career it was his first for Lone Star but the unmistakable swagger is already in place.

programme.title: Riders of the Whistling Skull
programme.desc: The Three Mesquiteers appeared in several Republic Pictures during the 1930s, and this is considered one of their best. It's about a mysterious murder at an archeological expedition, which leads the three prairie pals into some dangerous territory. Can they solve the murder without losing their own lives? The cast includes Robert Livingston, Ray Corrigan, Max Terhune, and Roger Williams, all trying to survive a hail of poison arrows and hot lead.

programme.title: The Sundowners
programme.desc: Brother battles brother in this gritty tale of feuding ranchers in the old west. This story of the Texas panhandle stars such familiar faces as Robert Preston, Chill Wills, and Jack Elam, and was a rare film for its time in that it was filmed almost entirely in Texas with no studio interiors. If for no other reason, watch this one for Prestons performance. If you only know him from The Music Man or Victor Victoria, youre sure to be surprised here! (also, look for John Drew Barrymore as Jef Cloud. He was part of the famous Barrymore family, and father of Drew Barrymore.) Jim Strake: Frank Cordell. The Whip: Dave Kashner. Directed by George Templeton.

programme.title: The Legend of the Lone Ranger
programme.desc: The Butch Cavendish gang ambushes a group of Texas Rangers, killing all but one. The surviving ranger is nursed back to health by Native American Tonto, and takes on the identity of a masked vigilante, determined to bring all outlaws to justice. Culled from episodes of the popular TV series, this feature is great fun for fans of the Lone Ranger. Starring Clayton Moore and Jay Silverheels.

programme.title: The Dude Ranger
programme.desc: Its nothing but action and thrills when an Easterner inherits a cattle ranch and discovers that thousands of cattle have been stolen. Secretly, he signs on as a hired hand at his own ranch to uncover the thief. Once he realizes whats going on, the city boy becomes a hard-riding, avenging son of a six- shooter! Directed by Edward F. Cline from a story by Zane Grey, the film stars George OBrien, Irene Hervey, and LeRoy Mason.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: There is hardly anything that inspires Ola Stenegard, Chief Designer at BMW Motorrad, as much as his trips through California. On a creative expedition through Los Angeles, he meets world-famous legends from the motorcycle industry.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: A ride in the Mercedes AMG SLS GT on the airfield and in a Porsche 911 Turbo S on the racetrack; Audi R8's innovative light engineering.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Jaguar is back in the world of sports cars with the F-Type, looking good and showing against the BMW Z4.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The Corvette, the Ford Mustang GT and the Chevrolet Camaro are the embodiment of the American sportscar.

programme.title: Lamborghini Huracan by O.CT
programme.desc: A lot of power thanks to a compressor; this optimized O.CT Lamborghini Huracn delivers over 800 horse power to get the blood flowing.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: A vehicle jumps at full speed over four cars, which explode one after the other.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: Insight into the world of film stunts.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: Nick jumps the air ramp.

programme.title: Mea Culpa - Korupcja w Watykanie
programme.desc: Jest to najpowaniejszy skandal finansowy ostatnich 30 lat w Watykanie. Nie tylko ze wzgldu na skal ekonomiczn, ale take dlatego, e tym razem papie Franciszek postanowi nie patrze nikomu w twarz i poleci watykaskiemu wymiarowi sprawiedliwoci postpowanie bez pobaania. ledztwo prowadzone przez promotorw sprawiedliwoci (dotyczce zakupu budynku w Londynie) dotyka tego serca Watykanu, departamentu najbliszego papieowi, czyli Sekretariatu Stanu. I siga a do Szwajcarii. W dugim wywiadzie Enrico Crasso, syndyk z siedzib w Lugano, ktry przez ponad dwadziecia lat pracowa jako zewntrzny zarzdca kasy Sekretariatu Stanu, a ktry teraz musi odpowiada przed watykaskim..

programme.title: Modowi Giganci
programme.desc: Dokument przedstawia sylwetki wybitnych postaci przemysu modowego i finansowe aspekty tego biznesu.

programme.title: Niemieckie dynastie - Oetkerowie
programme.desc: Rodzina Oetkerw, jedna z najbogatszych niemieckich rodzin, przez dekady unikaa mediw. Teraz, po raz pierwszy, jej czonkowie przerywaj milczenie i odkrywaj burzliwe losy firmy i rodziny. Cho kojarzeni gwnie z budyniem i proszkiem do pieczenia, ich historia skrywa mroczne sekrety, ktre zmieniy ich ycie na zawsze.

programme.title: Skorumpowany Przemys Spoywczy
programme.desc: laczego szynka jest rowa? Dlaczego uwaamy, e jest dobra dla naszych dzieci? Dlaczego etykiety produktw s niezrozumiae? Giganci przemysowi s w stanie wstrzyma i ukierunkowa decyzje polityczne bezporednio wpywajce na zdrowie publiczne.

programme.title: Gospodarka Wschodu
programme.desc: Codziennie pojawiaj si nowoci z Doliny Krzemowej. Wiele naszych technologii pochodzi z "Think Tanks" wiata zachodniego. Ale na Wschodzie take pojawiaj si innowacje i postp technologiczny. Czy to podre kosmiczne w Rosji, czy pionierzy robotyki w Japonii, wszyscy oni prbuj zdoby innowacyjn przewag konkurencyjn. Wybierz si z nami w podr po gospodarczym Wschodzie.

programme.title: Zagroenia Sztucznej Inteligencji
programme.desc: Analiza alternatywnego sposobu dokadnego badania opinii politycznych za pomoc programu sztucznej inteligencji o nazwie Polly.

programme.title: Cienie i Blaski Mody
programme.desc: Wielkie nazwiska w modzie wybieraj Chiczykw. Przybywaj oni tutaj w coraz wikszej liczbie i maj znaczcy wpyw na lokaln gospodark. Nasze badania nad Europ i Dolin Mody pokazuj, e za kulisami stosuje si kad sztuczk, aby zwikszy zyski - od luk podatkowych po system outsourcingu, w ktrym produkcja jest zlecana chiskim Wochom pracujcym w niedopuszczalnych warunkach. Rozczarowane spojrzenie na wielkie marki.

programme.title: Zagroenia Sztucznej Inteligencji
programme.desc: Analiza alternatywnego sposobu dokadnego badania opinii politycznych za pomoc programu sztucznej inteligencji o nazwie Polly.

programme.title: Zeitgest
programme.desc: Mitologia i wierzenia we wspczesnym spoeczestwie, przedstawiajce niecodzienne perspektywy powszechnych zagadnie kulturowych.

programme.title: Gorcy Pienidz
programme.desc: Film dokumentalny o finansach w wersji z polskim lektorem.

programme.title: Dark Web - Boom na czarnym rynku
programme.desc: Internet ma swoj ciemn stron, o ktrej istnieniu prawdopodobnie nawet nie wiemy. Za pozytywn powok mediw spoecznociowych, aplikacji komunikacyjnych i platform, ktre uczyniy nasze ycie atwiejszym i zbliyy do siebie, znajdziemy przestpcw wykorzystujcych te same aplikacje i platformy do prowadzenia nielegalnych i niebezpiecznych dziaa.

programme.title: Amerykaskie Pastwo Nadzoru
programme.desc: Film ten analizuje obecny stan inwigilacji w Stanach Zjednoczonych. Czy prywatno jest przestarza fantazj? Czy mamy przyzwyczai si do myli, e kto nas cigle obserwuje.

programme.title: Bitcoin - Koniec Pienidza Ktry Wszyscy Znamy
programme.desc: Bitcoin: Koniec pienidza, ktry wszyscy znamy ledzi histori pienidza od spoeczestw barterowych staroytnego wiata do parkietw giedowych Wall St. Dokument demaskuje praktyki bankw centralnych i podejrzanych aktorw finansowych, ktrzy rzucili wiat na kolana w czasie ostatniego kryzysu. Podkrela wpyw rzdu na proces kreacji pienidza i to, w jaki sposb powoduje on inflacj. Co wicej, film ten wyjania, jak wikszo pienidzy, ktrymi si dzi posugujemy, jest tworzona z powietrza przez banki, gdy kreuj one dug. Epicki w zakresie, ten film bada wzorce innowacji technologicznych i kwestionuje wszystko, co mylae, e wiesz o pienidzach. Czy Bitcoin jest alternatyw dla..

programme.title: Gospodarka Pnocy
programme.desc: Co maj wsplnego Szwecja, Kanada i Islandia? Zgadza si, s pooone wysoko na pnocy, gdzie panuje nieg i jest zimno. Ale wanie ten ekstremalny klimat da pocztek caej gamie technologii i innowacyjnych pomysw, bez ktrych kraje takie jak Islandia i Szwecja nie byyby konkurencyjne. Wybierz si z nami w podr po gospodarce Pnocy.

programme.title: Dark Web - Boom na czarnym rynku
programme.desc: Internet ma swoj ciemn stron, o ktrej istnieniu prawdopodobnie nawet nie wiemy. Za pozytywn powok mediw spoecznociowych, aplikacji komunikacyjnych i platform, ktre uczyniy nasze ycie atwiejszym i zbliyy do siebie, znajdziemy przestpcw wykorzystujcych te same aplikacje i platformy do prowadzenia nielegalnych i niebezpiecznych dziaa.

programme.title: Jak narzucaj nam styl ycia
programme.desc: ycie to wybr. To, co jemy, co czytamy, kogo wybieramy; kadego dnia dokonujemy tysicy wyborw, ktre okrelaj jak chcemy y. A jeli moliwo wyboru jest tylko iluzj.

programme.title: Marketing Mesjasza
programme.desc: Jak duo *naprawd* wiesz o tym, jak zaczo si chrzecijastwo? Bez wzgldu na to, czy jeste chrzecijaninem, ateist, czy czonkiem innego wyznania, nie sposb zignorowa wpywu, jaki chrzecijastwo wywaro na zachodni cywilizacj.

programme.title: Przepa (Czy wszyscy bdziemy biedniejsi?)
programme.desc: Siedem niepowizanych ze sob osb, dcych do lepszego ycia w Stanach Zjednoczonych i Wielkiej Brytanii, odkrywa, e gra moe by ustawiona przeciwko nim. Filmowiec Katharine Round uwiecznia intymne chwile, aby stworzy mozaik ycia, ktre jest uwizione w objciach strachu i niepewnoci - wynikajcych z coraz wikszej przepaci midzy najbogatszymi a najbiedniejszymi.

programme.title: Cienie i Blaski Mody
programme.desc: Wielkie nazwiska w modzie wybieraj Chiczykw. Przybywaj oni tutaj w coraz wikszej liczbie i maj znaczcy wpyw na lokaln gospodark. Nasze badania nad Europ i Dolin Mody pokazuj, e za kulisami stosuje si kad sztuczk, aby zwikszy zyski - od luk podatkowych po system outsourcingu, w ktrym produkcja jest zlecana chiskim Wochom pracujcym w niedopuszczalnych warunkach. Rozczarowane spojrzenie na wielkie marki.

programme.title: Chiska Autostrada Handlowa
programme.desc: Dokument w wersji z polskim lektorem. Inicjatywa Pasa i Drogi to sie handlowa pomidzy Azj, Europ i Afryk. Ponad 70 krajw jest obecnie czci tej sieci. Inicjatywa Pasa i Drogi jest uwaana za centralny punkt polityki zagranicznej sekretarza generalnego Komunistycznej Partii Chin Xi Jinpinga. Chiski rzd nazywa inicjatyw "prb poprawy regionalnej cznoci i denia do lepszej przyszoci." Niektrzy obserwatorzy widz w niej plan chiskiej dominacji na wiecie poprzez skoncentrowan na Chinach globaln sie handlow. Projekt ma zosta ukoczony do 2049 roku, co zbiega si z setn rocznic powstania Chiskiej Republiki Ludowej.

programme.title: Amerykaskie Pastwo Nadzoru
programme.desc: Film ten analizuje obecny stan inwigilacji w Stanach Zjednoczonych. Czy prywatno jest przestarza fantazj? Czy mamy przyzwyczai si do myli, e kto nas cigle obserwuje.

programme.title: Najwiksze niemieckie klasy - historia firmy C&A
programme.desc: Wielkie niemieckie klany - historia C&A. Firma ma ponad 456 sklepw. Znajdziemy je w kadym wikszym niemieckim miecie. A 98% Niemcw zna t mark.

programme.title: Gospodarka Chin i Cyfrowe Pienidze
programme.desc: Chiny ogaszaj wszystkie transakcje kryptowalutowe za nielegalne.

programme.title: Wadcy Jena
programme.desc: Rozgrywajcy si w XX-wiecznej Japonii film dokumentalny bada rol i potg bankw centralnych oraz sposb, w jaki mona je wykorzysta do zmiany struktur gospodarczych, politycznych i spoecznych kraju.

programme.title: Magiczne Pienidze - Rewolucja Bitcoina
programme.desc: Magiczne Pienidze to film dokumentalny, ktry bada tajemnicze pochodzenie Bitcoina, jego rol w spoeczestwie oraz to, w jaki sposb moe on ksztatowa przyszo naszego wiata.

programme.title: yjc Przeszoci Przyszoci
programme.desc: Ten film podwaa nasz sposb mylenia i zapewnia oryginalny wgld w nasze podwiadome motywacje, niezamierzone konsekwencje i sposb, w jaki nasza podstawowa natura wpywa na nasz przyszo jako ludzkoci.

programme.title: Token - przyszo systemu ekonomicznego
programme.desc: wiat finansw podlega cigym zmianom. Wraz z postpem cyfryzacji w XXI wieku proces ten gwatownie przyspieszy i otworzy nowe moliwoci mylenia o finansach.

programme.title: Szwajcaria i krypto rewolucja
programme.desc: Trzymajcy w napiciu dokument o kryptowalucie w Szwajcarii: Szwajcaria i krypto rewolucja. Jak odrodz si banki i rzdy.

programme.title: Gospodarka w Fazie Przejciowej
programme.desc: Przyszo jest niepewna i pena wyzwa. Jak ratowa nasze miasta i zwalcza nierwnoci? Jak poradzimy sobie ze starzejcym si spoeczestwem? Jak poradzi sobie z nierwnoci pac? Nadszed czas na mylenie o przyszoci.

programme.title: Aborygeni: mroczny sekret Australii
programme.desc: UTOPIA to film ujawniajcy, e apartheid jest gboko zakorzeniony w przeszoci i teraniejszoci Australii, a Aborygeni nadal yj w skrajnym ubstwie i warunkach jak w krajach trzeciego wiata. Maj nisk redni dugoci ycia i nieproporcjonalnie wysoki wskanik zgonw w aresztach policyjnych.

programme.title: Niemieckie dynastie - Oetkerowie
programme.desc: Rodzina Oetkerw, jedna z najbogatszych niemieckich rodzin, przez dekady unikaa mediw. Teraz, po raz pierwszy, jej czonkowie przerywaj milczenie i odkrywaj burzliwe losy firmy i rodziny. Cho kojarzeni gwnie z budyniem i proszkiem do pieczenia, ich historia skrywa mroczne sekrety, ktre zmieniy ich ycie na zawsze.

programme.title: Niechybny Koniec. Jak pienidze straciy swoj warto
programme.desc: Wall Street jest okupowana. Europa wali si na siebie. Na caym wiecie ludzie s ogarnici strachem i gniewem, a jedno pytanie jest na ustach wszystkich: Czy kryzys finansowy si skoczy, czy te zmierzamy w kierunku gospodarczej katastrofy? End of the Road to film dokumentalny, ktry jest kronik globalnego krachu finansowego.

programme.title: wiatowy Rynek Sztuki
programme.desc: wiatowy rynek sztuki jest warty 67,8 miliarda dolarw. To ekosystem skrajnoci charakteryzujcy si gbokimi strukturami wadzy, rynek prnoci, mitw i hipizmu, znajdujcy si w rkach kilku wpywowych graczy. Za byszczc fasad krluj nierwno i konkurencja. Industrializacja od lat 90. XX wieku, przyspieszya handel dzieami sztuki i zglobalizowaa zbiorowy gust, ale sam rynek sztuki pozostaje w duej mierze nieprzejrzysty. Dlaczego? Jak funkcjonuje wiatowy rynek sztuki? Kto ustala ceny? Jak dziaaj domy aukcyjne i galerie? Dlaczego super bogaci inwestuj w sztuk, co tak naprawd dostaj artyci oraz jak Internet wpywa na handel dzieami sztuki? Zesp kanau Moconomy..

programme.title: Gospodarka Jutra
programme.desc: Przyszo jest niepewna i pena wyzwa. Jak uratujemy nasze miasta i rozwiemy problem nierwnoci? Jak poradzimy sobie z problemem starzejcego si spoeczestwa? Jak zniwelujemy rnice pacowe midzy pciami? Nadszed czas zastanowi si nad przyszoci.

programme.title: Legendy Internetu
programme.desc: W tym dokumencie opowiadamy historie zaoycieli najwikszych firm internetowych.

programme.title: Norwegia i Samochody Elektryczne
programme.desc: Samochody elektryczne s w Norwegii bardzo popularne. Mimo, e powietrze w tym kraju jest mniej zanieczyszczone ni w innych krajach europejskich, Norwegowie wydobywaj duo ropy. Dlaczego wic tak bardzo inwestuj w samochody elektryczne? Jakie s powody, ktre skoniy ich do opracowania tego rodzaju samochodu.

programme.title: Bitcoin: Poza bak
programme.desc: Wraz z pojawieniem si Bitcoin, pierwszej na wiecie waluty cyfrowej, po raz pierwszy w historii pienidze nie s ju kontrolowane przez banki lub rzdy, ale przez ludzi, ktrzy ich uywaj.

programme.title: Gospodarka Wschodu
programme.desc: Codziennie pojawiaj si nowoci z Doliny Krzemowej. Wiele naszych technologii pochodzi z "Think Tanks" wiata zachodniego. Ale na Wschodzie take pojawiaj si innowacje i postp technologiczny. Czy to podre kosmiczne w Rosji, czy pionierzy robotyki w Japonii, wszyscy oni prbuj zdoby innowacyjn przewag konkurencyjn. Wybierz si z nami w podr po gospodarczym Wschodzie.

programme.title: Mafia, Kokaina i Biae Konierzyki
programme.desc: Jest kokaina, tony kokainy, jeden z najbogatszych i najwaniejszych szefw Ndranghety w Europie i tak zwana szwajcarska pralka. Ten raport ledzi przepyw brudnych pienidzy od dealerw w Ameryce Poudniowej i oferuje niepokojce okno na ycie pracownikw umysowych w Ticino.

programme.title: Samodzielni
programme.desc: Dokument przedstawia sylwetki czterech osb, ktre zmieniy si w self-made celebrytw i gigantw biznesu.

programme.title: Mea Culpa - Korupcja w Watykanie
programme.desc: Jest to najpowaniejszy skandal finansowy ostatnich 30 lat w Watykanie. Nie tylko ze wzgldu na skal ekonomiczn, ale take dlatego, e tym razem papie Franciszek postanowi nie patrze nikomu w twarz i poleci watykaskiemu wymiarowi sprawiedliwoci postpowanie bez pobaania. ledztwo prowadzone przez promotorw sprawiedliwoci (dotyczce zakupu budynku w Londynie) dotyka tego serca Watykanu, departamentu najbliszego papieowi, czyli Sekretariatu Stanu. programme.title: Kto Rzdzi Ameryk
programme.desc: Polityczny film dokumentalny w wersji z polskim lektorem.

programme.title: Kto Rzdzi Ameryk Part 2
programme.desc: Spojrzenie na tak zwany demokratyczny system rzdzenia w Stanach Zjednoczonych Ameryki, ujawniajcy rzeczywiste siy, ktre rzdz narodem.

programme.title: Modowi Giganci
programme.desc: Dokument przedstawia sylwetki wybitnych postaci przemysu modowego i finansowe aspekty tego biznesu.

programme.title: Giganci Techniki
programme.desc: Giganci Techniki w wersji z polskim lektorem. W tym dokumencie opowiadamy historie ludzi biznesu, ktrzy zmienili wiat.

programme.title: 97% niczego
programme.desc: Dokument przedstawia powane badania i weryfikowalne dowody dotyczce naszego systemu gospodarczego i finansowego.

programme.title: Zmierzch Yakuzy
programme.desc: Czym jest Yakuza? Czy to rak narodu czy zo konieczne w kraju o jednym z najniszych wskanikw przestpczoci w uprzemysowionym wiecie.

programme.title: Ekonomia Poudnia
programme.desc: Australia, Nowa Zelandia i Chile strasznie sabo radz sobie z technologi. Przez lata utalentowani programici tych krajw uciekali do Doliny Krzemowej w USA, by tam zarabia na ycie. Ostatnie programy rzdw Australii, Nowej Zelandii i Chile niedofinansowyway nauki i technologii. Istniej jednak przesanki by sdzi, e kraje te zaczy zatrzymywa niektre z rodzimych talentw technologicznych.

programme.title: Niechciani Turyci
programme.desc: Turystyka powoduje wzrost cen i brutalizacj sklepw, restauracji i kultury w ogle. W najczciej odwiedzanych miastach Europy istniej dzielnice, z ktrych mieszkacy s wypychani - turyci mog paci czynsze, na ktre nie sta miejscowych. Jest to szczeglnie widoczne w Wenecji i Barcelonie, gdzie ludzie mobilizuj si, by domaga si utrzymania turystyki w pewnych granicach.

programme.title: Skorumpowany Przemys Spoywczy
programme.desc: laczego szynka jest rowa? Dlaczego uwaamy, e jest dobra dla naszych dzieci? Dlaczego etykiety produktw s niezrozumiae? Giganci przemysowi s w stanie wstrzyma i ukierunkowa decyzje polityczne bezporednio wpywajce na zdrowie publiczne.

programme.title: Niemieckie dynastie - Thyssenowie
programme.desc: Niemieckie dynastie: Thyssenowie - To mityczne ju nazwisko. Kojarzy si nie tylko z cikim przemysem, ale te z wytworn sztuk i niewyobraalnym bogactwem z ni zwizanym.

programme.title: Krupp - Mit i prawda
programme.desc: Historia rodziny Kruppw ukazuje dramatyczny rozwj niemieckiego przemysu i ich prywatnych tragedii. Czonkowie rodziny, cho szanowani, czsto umierali w samotnoci, powicajc osobiste szczcie dla interesw firmy. W filmie odkrywane s nieznane fakty, a potomkowie rodziny opowiadaj o jej cenie sukcesu i tragedii czterech pokole.

programme.title: ASEAN Nastpne Pokolenie
programme.desc: 10 krajw, 640 milionw ludzi, czna gospodarka tak dua jak Indie. ASEAN przygotowuje si na kolejne pokolenie.

programme.title: Pajcza Sie - Drugie Imperium Brytyjskie
programme.desc: Jak Wielka Brytania przeksztacia si z najwikszego imperium kolonialnego w nowoczesn potg finansow.

programme.title: Jak Naprawi Firm
programme.desc: Wiele firm przeszo przez dug faz bada i testowania swoich produktw. Inwestorzy potrzebowali duej siy przebicia, a ich modele biznesowe byy naraone na gwatowne wstrzsy na rynku. W tym filmie dokumentalnym przyjrzymy si bliej niektrym z tych firm i ich drodze do sukcesu. Wiele z nich miao trudn drog do osignicia rentownoci lub odzyskania konkurencyjnoci.

programme.title: Gospodarka Zachodu
programme.desc: Na zachodzie znajdziemy jednych z najwikszych lub przynajmniej najbardziej ekscentrycznych wynalazcw wiata. To rzemioso jest seksown besti popychajc maszyny do granic moliwoci. Jeli spojrze na pustyni Mojave w USA lub Wielk Brytani z czasw drugiej wojny wiatowej, to s to miejsca, ktre pawi si w inynierskiej pasji i oferuj wolno niestrudzonym majsterkowiczom.

programme.title: Marketing Mesjasza
programme.desc: Jak duo *naprawd* wiesz o tym, jak zaczo si chrzecijastwo? Bez wzgldu na to, czy jeste chrzecijaninem, ateist, czy czonkiem innego wyznania, nie sposb zignorowa wpywu, jaki chrzecijastwo wywaro na zachodni cywilizacj.

Jest to szczeglnie widoczne w Wenecji i Barcelonie, gdzie ludzie mobilizuj si, by domaga si utrzymania turystyki w pewnych granicach.

programme.title: Giganci Techniki
programme.desc: Giganci Techniki w wersji z polskim lektorem. W tym dokumencie opowiadamy historie ludzi biznesu, ktrzy zmienili wiat.

programme.title: Niechybny Koniec. Jak pienidze straciy swoj warto
programme.desc: Wall Street jest okupowana. Europa wali si na siebie. Na caym wiecie ludzie s ogarnici strachem i gniewem, a jedno pytanie jest na ustach wszystkich: Czy kryzys finansowy si skoczy, czy te zmierzamy w kierunku gospodarczej katastrofy? End of the Road to film dokumentalny, ktry jest kronik globalnego krachu finansowego.

programme.title: Ekonomia Poudnia
programme.desc: Australia, Nowa Zelandia i Chile strasznie sabo radz sobie z technologi. Przez lata utalentowani programici tych krajw uciekali do Doliny Krzemowej w USA, by tam zarabia na ycie. Ostatnie programy rzdw Australii, Nowej Zelandii i Chile niedofinansowyway nauki i technologii. Istniej jednak przesanki by sdzi, e kraje te zaczy zatrzymywa niektre z rodzimych talentw technologicznych.

programme.title: Szwajcaria i krypto rewolucja
programme.desc: Trzymajcy w napiciu dokument o kryptowalucie w Szwajcarii: Szwajcaria i krypto rewolucja. Jak odrodz si banki i rzdy.

programme.title: ASEAN Nastpne Pokolenie
programme.desc: 10 krajw, 640 milionw ludzi, czna gospodarka tak dua jak Indie. ASEAN przygotowuje si na kolejne pokolenie.

programme.title: yjc Przeszoci Przyszoci
programme.desc: Ten film podwaa nasz sposb mylenia i zapewnia oryginalny wgld w nasze podwiadome motywacje, niezamierzone konsekwencje i sposb, w jaki nasza podstawowa natura wpywa na nasz przyszo jako ludzkoci.

programme.title: Life in Pictures: Mark Webber
programme.desc: We take you through Webbers early career and path to F1, from his arrival in the UK and Formula Ford in 1996, to joining up with Benetton and Flavio Briatore in 2001 and his transition to Jaguar and eventually Red Bull Racing. All photos used are taken from Motorsport Images, the largest collection of motorsport pictures in the world. (Warning, video contains some explicit language).

programme.title: Kevin Schwantz's verdict on the MotoGP 2025 season so far
programme.desc: MotoGP Legend and 1993 World Champion Kevin Schwantz spoke to us at last week's Grand Prix of the Americas gave us his take on the 2025 season so far. Kevin describes the dynamic between Ducati teammates Bagnaia and Marquez while relating to his own career, as well as well where brother Alex fits into the title fight. Theres also Kevins opinion on the state of developing talent in the United States via MotoAmerica, how MotoGP can learn from F1s Drive to Survive as the sport tries to extend its reach in the US, and how Europe has taken over the development of bikes in the sport.

All photos used are taken from Motorsport Images, the largest collection of motorsport pictures in the world. (Warning, video contains some explicit language).

programme.title: Autosport
programme.sub-title: Ranking Autosport's Top 50 Drivers of 2024 - 20 to 11
programme.desc: In this episode, we look at the drivers ranked from 20th to 11th place, featuring drivers from F1, F2, the BTCC, Formula E and the world of Sportscars.

programme.title: Castrol Toyota Formula Regional Oceania Championship
programme.desc: Watch the first race of the fourth round of the 2025 Castrol Toyota Formula Regional Championship season at Teretonga Park, New Zealand.

programme.title: Kevin Schwantz's verdict on the MotoGP 2025 season so far
programme.desc: MotoGP Legend and 1993 World Champion Kevin Schwantz spoke to us at last week's Grand Prix of the Americas gave us his take on the 2025 season so far. Kevin describes the dynamic between Ducati teammates Bagnaia and Marquez while relating to his own career, as well as well where brother Alex fits into the title fight. Theres also Kevins opinion on the state of developing talent in the United States via MotoAmerica, how MotoGP can learn from F1s Drive to Survive as the sport tries to extend its reach in the US, and how Europe has taken over the development of bikes in the sport.

programme.title: NASCAR
programme.sub-title: Race Rewind: Pennzoil 400 at Las Vegas Motor Speedway
programme.desc: There's nothing like a spring race in the desert. See who goes all in and takes the gamble to net their first career Cup Series win.

programme.title: Roaring To Victory - Jaguar
programme.desc: This is the action-packed story of how the legendary British marque roared back to victory. Archive race footage traces the full story of how Tom Walkinshaw Racing took Jaguar to the top, claiming World Championship success and securing Jaguar's first victory at the Le Mans 24 Hours for 31 years.

programme.title: Ranking all of Ayrton Senna's Formula 1 cars
programme.desc: A quarter of a century has passed since we lost Ayrton Senna and Roland Ratzenberger at the 1994 San Marino Grand Prix at Imola. To mark the 25 years that have passed, Glenn Freeman, Kevin Turner and Ben Anderson debate which of Senna's F1 cars were the best (and worst!) to come up with a definitive ranking of all 12 cars that he raced during his career.

programme.desc: 52 years ago on the 7th of April 1968, F1 lost it's benchmark driver Jim Clark. To celebrate his sporting achievements, we've taken a look through his races and picked out his top 10 drives, along with some help from the man himself.

programme.desc: The soul of every story is in the song. Simon Bates presents the top 20 from across the decades, as chosen by you - each story is unique, each is different.

programme.title: All Day - 80s Power Ballads
programme.desc: From the decade that invented the genre - non-stop powerful love songs, back to back.

programme.title: 80s Yacht Rock! Top 30
programme.desc: The smooth laid-back sounds influenced by the US West Coast. With Toto, Christopher Cross, Hall & Oates, George Benson & Michael McDonald.

programme.title: Turbo Trax
programme.desc: A non-stop ticket to the ultimate retro rave! We crank up the neon and hit the dancefloor with the most electrifying feelgood music videos the 80s had to offer.

programme.title: Liverpool Legends! The Top 25
programme.desc: Liverpool has a huge musical heritage, so let's celebrate with two hours of the city's top stars of the 80s like Frankie Goes To Hollywood, Sonia, OMD, plus three of the Fab Four.

programme.title: Sinitta's Everyone I Fancied
programme.desc: 100 minutes of everyone Sinitta fancied being, or just plain adored in the 80s. Her favourite boys & gorgeous girls in their fiercest videos - you'll fancy them a little bit too.

programme.title: The NOW Yearbook 1986
programme.desc: Bruno Brookes flicks through the pages of another Yearbook. 1986 introduced us to Samantha Fox, Sinitta & Sigue Sigue Sputnik. But we also said a 'Final' goodbye to Wham.

programme.title: The NOW Yearbook 1987
programme.desc: Jenny Powell flicks through the pages of another Yearbook. 1987 had 'No Limits' on the TV & Stock, Aitken & Waterman cranking an endless stream of massive, catchy hits.

programme.title: 1987's One-Hit-Wonders! Top 10
programme.desc: 10 artists that had a single big song in 1987 - then never darkened the UK Top 20 ever again! Remember Taffy, Westworld, Karel Fialka or Morris Minor & The Majors.

programme.title: 1987 Unleashed
programme.desc: Dramatic storylines, big dance routines, neon lights & iconic fashions - these are the classic music videos that made 1987.

programme.title: Rick Astley's Hit Factory & Beyond
programme.desc: Rick's here, not just with Stock, Aitken & Waterman's big stars like Kylie and Jason, but with other massive 80s bangers that influenced the brilliant Hit Factory sound. Jump in.

programme.desc: Non-stop 80s rock & power ballads - all night! From Queen, Bon Jovi & Whitesnake to Meat Loaf, Bonnie Tyler & Tina Turner.

programme.title: Closet Space

programme.title: Haymaker
