programme.title: Taaaki karp
programme.desc: Tym razem ekipa rusza do Holandii, na stawy Carplantis, gdzie yj wyjtkowo wielkie karpie.

programme.title: Gruchoty z kanadyjskiej guszy
programme.desc: Glen i Bill uruchamiaj firm Wreckless Restorations, ale spieraj si o terminy. Peter i Jason podejmuj si odbudowy maszyny pokrytej botem, ktrej czyszczenie nie idzie tak dobrze, jak oczekiwali.

programme.title: Poszukiwacze klejnotw: Australia
programme.desc: Ray nigdy nie przepuszcza adnej okazji: naby kolejn dziak i planuje wykona prbny odwiert, jeli tylko jego wiertnica sprosta temu zadaniu. Do poszukiwaczy doczaj Nigel i Rosa Monteithowie.

programme.title: Drwale z Kolumbii Brytyjskiej
programme.desc: Craig i jego ekipa wracaj do domu. Okazuje si, e 26-kilometrowa droga Badgera jest rwnie zdradliwa, jak droga Gollen. Obfite opady niegu w Celista w Kolumbii Brytyjskiej krzyuj plany Brenta.

programme.title: Krlowie zomu
programme.desc: W Oxfordshire potrzeba jest ogromna koparka, ktra jednak psuje si po dotarciu na miejsce. W Lancashire ekipa musi ocali historyczny, rzebiony kamie znaleziony w czasie rozbirki domu publicznego.

programme.title: Australijscy poawiacze homarw
programme.desc: Fatalna pogoda sprawia ogromne trudnoci zaodze kutra Chieftain, Squizzy dzwoni do swojego tajnego kontaktu w celu uzyskania poufnych informacji, a rybacka dynastia Jagerw chwieje si w posadach.

programme.title: Najwiksze pomyki inynierw
programme.desc: Jaka bya przyczyna zawalenia si mostu na autostradzie w Minneapolis w samym rodku godziny szczytu? Dlaczego rutynowa rozbirka w Dallas wprawia tumy gapiw w osupienie.

programme.title: Taaaki karp
programme.desc: To pierwszy odcinek programu nakrcony w Wielkiej Brytanii. owiska Wasing Estate w Berkshire to grupa jezior, w ktrych zowiono najwikszego karpia na Wyspach Brytyjskich.

programme.title: Gruchoty z kanadyjskiej guszy
programme.desc: Peter i Jason cigaj si z czasem, chcc zaskoczy Audrey i odrestaurowa jej ukochan corvette. Wreckless Restorations ryzykuje, zatrudniajc nowego pracownika, aby rozwin swoj dziaalno.

programme.title: Poszukiwacze klejnotw: Australia
programme.desc: Anthony i Jodie chc wrci do poszukiwania szafirw, ale najpierw musz usun du bry granitu. Matt i Amber nawizuj wspprac z miejscowym grnikiem.

programme.title: Drwale z Kolumbii Brytyjskiej
programme.desc: Z jednej z wycigarek Gloverw w Kootenays zaczyna wydobywa si gsty, biay dym. Jeszcze bardziej niepokojce wydaj si jednak koczce sezon informacje o dziaaniach wadz.

programme.title: Krlowie zomu
programme.desc: W Jersey trzeba rozebra star stacj kolejki linowej na szczycie wzgrza, gdzie prowadzi tylko jedna, wska droga. W Dorset artysta rzebicy ze zomu oddaje hod bohaterowi I wojny wiatowej.

programme.title: Australijscy poawiacze homarw
programme.desc: Snoddy wykorzystuje okno pogodowe, prbujc zowi jak najwicej homarw; spadek cen ma ogromne konsekwencje dla Squizzy'ego, a Bryce otrzymuje doskona ofert.

programme.title: Najwiksze pomyki inynierw
programme.desc: W Kentucky przeraajco silny lej krasowy pochania legendarne Chevrolety Corvette. Podczas budowy ogromnego mostu w Melbourne w Australii dochodzi do tragicznej katastrofy.

programme.title: Najwiksze pomyki inynierw
programme.desc: Zabytkowy most w Pensylwanii musi stawi czoa Matce Naturze. Nowojorsk dzielnic wstrzsa katastrofa budowlana. Zapada si szpitalny parking w Neapolu.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.desc: Adventurer George Kourounis patience is tested as he encounters deadly wildlife and challenging elements while preparing to descend into Marum Volcano in the South Pacific.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.desc: Doubt and disbelief plague the Stormhunters after an exhaustive chase through Tornado Alley. The team is forced to make an uncomfortable decision. Do they play it safe or push past their fear.

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: Extreme Weather Countdown Throwing Porta Potties to the Wind
programme.desc: The world is a dangerous place, and with wild weather occurances happening every 20 seconds, it's no wonder we never have a shortage of footage to showcase here. The videos we have gathered are guarenteed to blow you away, so let's not waste anymore time and jump right into it.

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: Extreme Weather Countdown When It Rains It Pours
programme.desc: Welcome to Extreme Weather Countdown, where lightning can strike and the earth can quake all in one episode.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.desc: Adventurer George Kourounis patience is tested as he encounters deadly wildlife and challenging elements while preparing to descend into Marum Volcano in the South Pacific.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.desc: Doubt and disbelief plague the Stormhunters after an exhaustive chase through Tornado Alley. The team is forced to make an uncomfortable decision. Do they play it safe or push past their fear.

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: Extreme Weather Countdown Throwing Porta Potties to the Wind
programme.desc: The world is a dangerous place, and with wild weather occurances happening every 20 seconds, it's no wonder we never have a shortage of footage to showcase here. The videos we have gathered are guarenteed to blow you away, so let's not waste anymore time and jump right into it.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: Angry Planet is there as 3 storms make landfall as hurricanes in the US.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: No-one creates eco-disasters on quite the scale of the former Soviet Union. In Uzbekistan, the Aral Sea, once one of the largest freshwater lakes in the world, has seen its waters diverted, so that it has shrunk to 1/6 its previous size. In Crimea, a mountain has been carved into a james bondian submarine base. In northern Ukraine, the Chernobyl nuclear site has been reduced to a radioactive wasteland.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: George returns to the Fin Del Mundo at the southern tip of Argentina, this time to sail on a Russian icebreaker to Antarctica. After braving the stormy Drake passage, he explores volcanic Deception Island, camps out in the Antarctic snow, and paddles a kayak through icebergs calved off the melting glaciers.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: Filming the volcanoes, mudpools and geysers in the geothermic wonderland of New Zealands north island, we learn that a new island is being created by an undersea volcano 1000 miles north in Tonga. Determined to be among the first to see this newest land on earth, we head for the remote island by plane and boat, after various nautical mishaps, George ends up, bedraggled and clad in nothing but underwear and a lifejacket, honored to be one of the very first to explore this brand new island.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: We break the bounds of earth, and look at the environment of space. We examine the difficulties and challenges of exploring this most challenging environment. George experiences some of the extreme training needed for space travel aboard a Czech-built Albatross fighter jet, the Zero-G plane, and a centrifuge producing 6 Gs of force, and witnesses the launch of a flight to the International Space Station.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: In 2000, a remarkable find was made in Chihuahua, Mexico, of a spectacular cave filled with giant crystals, some over 20 meters long. But it is a intensely difficult spot to explore with temperatures over 50 degrees C and humidity well over 100%. George leads an Explorers Club Flag Expedition into the cave, wearing special refrigerated suits and respirators to battle the extreme environment.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: The Angry Planet team hopes to film the natural wonders and extreme phenomena of this fascinating Central Asian country, including a spectacularly burning crater of natural gas, underground lakes, sandstorms and remnants of the dinosaurs.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: For George Kourounis ground zero for stormchasing is Oklahoma City, the capital ofTornado Alley.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: The Angry Planet team heads to Africa to climb the steep and very active Nyiragongo Volcano in the Congo that erupted in 2002, sending 125,000 people fleeing for their lives. Host/adventurer George Kourounis explores the bubbling lake of molten lava and investigates the risk the dangerous volcano poses to both the people of city of Goma and the Mountain Gorillas who live on the nearby jungle slopes.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.sub-title: Angry Planet The Winds of Autumn
programme.desc: The autumn of 2006 brings hurricanes to the North Atlantic and hot dry winds fan forest fires across Northern Ontario. Host/adventurer George Kourounis has traveled to some awesome hurricanes, including Rita and Katrina, with his pal Mark Robinson. This year they stormchase in Newfoundland, site of the hurricane that pulled Mark out of a life-threatening depression.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: Host George Kourounis has braved many terrifying phenomena but none as frightening as the one he takes on in this episode: marriage! To make sure his new bride is on the same adventurous page with him, he proposes to get married on the lip of an exploding volcano, on the South Pacific island of Tanna, in Vanuatu. Before the native preacher, dressed in grass skirt and kustom garb, gets to perform the smoky vows, George descends into the erupting volcano to bring out red hot samples of the lava it is producing.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: Avalanche danger is very high in the Rogers Pass area of the Trans Canada Highway in British Columbia. Host of Angry Planet George Kourounis travels with a variety of experts to bring down huge avalanches in the Rocky Mountains. Ski Patrollers throw hand charges to clear the slopes, the British Columbia Department of Highways uses helicopter bombing and mountaintop mortars to keep the roads safe, and the Canadian Armed Forces fire 105mm howitzers at the mountains to bring down the dangerous snow. Still, there are accidents and fatalities in the mountains. We meet Francois Desroisers, an avalanche burial victim who tells a terrible and tragic tale of a mountain disaster.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: Some of the fiercest weather can be experienced at the area the South Americans call the Fin del Mundo.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: George returns to Tornado Alley with 3 fellow stormchasers to see what the 2007 Storm Season will bring.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: One of the most exciting episodes of season one is Wild Water our look at Great White Sharks, water-filled caves and high voltage marine action.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: We hope Season Two will give us the opportunity to make the quintessential Angry Planet show a full episode exploring a major hurricane that makes landfall in Florida or the Carolinas.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.sub-title: Storm Hunters Height of Ruin - Part 2
programme.desc: While in Nepal, the Stormhunters receive unexpected news that literally takes this trip to the next level. They contend with mountainous terrain, adverse weather and altitude sickness in their quest to glimpse Earth's highest mountain.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.desc: The North Atlantic Ocean is generous with her bounty, until she takes a life in return. Mark braves the deep seas on the most dangerous day of the lobster fishing season.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.desc: Mark & Jaclyn chase extreme winter weather as Noreasters hammer Atlantic Canada.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.desc: Its an ordinary town with a history of heartache. No one knows why Moore, Oklahoma has been the target of 3 mega-tornadoes in just 16 years. On the heels of the May 20, 2013 EF5 tornado, Mark & Jaclyn uncover stories behind the disaster, the recovery and the tenacious spirit of the people of the US Midwest.

programme.title: Mission: Hurricane
programme.desc: In 2019, Josh Morgerman chased Hurricane Dorian in the Bahamas in what wound up becoming one of the most intense and dangerous storms he has ever encountered.

programme.title: Mission: Hurricane
programme.desc: Josh Morgerman chased 3 typhoons in 6 days, a personal record amidst the Western Pacific's destructive forces.

programme.title: Sinister Storms
programme.desc: Hurricanes, firestorms, dust devils, and shifting grounds sweep through the land, leaving destruction.

programme.title: Sinister Storms
programme.desc: Experience the transformative power of nature's most extremes.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.desc: Will perilous conditions put the Stormhunters in the line of danger as the violent storm spins out of control.

programme.title: Hellfire Heroes
programme.desc: Firefighters burn grass fields hoping to prevent a repeat of the 2011 wildfires that devastated the town.

programme.title: Hellfire Heroes
programme.sub-title: Hellfire Heroes Not If, But When
programme.desc: Firefighters and survivors share their stories; experts discuss the reality of wildfires.

programme.title: Captured: Extreme Weather
programme.desc: Tornadoes; they are the embodiment of severe weather. In this episode we show some of the most terrifying weather caught on camera; from surviving a direct hit to a tornado in a typhoon.

programme.title: Captured: Extreme Weather
programme.desc: Volcanic ash engulfing a town, a massive firenado in California - just some of the viral weather videos caught on camera in this episode of Captured, as Vicious Winds take center stage.

programme.title: Captured: Extreme Weather
programme.sub-title: Captured: Extreme Weather Power of Water
programme.desc: Humans are inclined to take the natural element of water for granted; until they witness its relentless power and destructive capabilities.

programme.title: Captured: Extreme Weather
programme.desc: A catastrophic earthquake, a mesmerizing avalanche, a destructive tornado, and an unintentional smashup derby on icy highways; our experts weigh in on these viral videos as people get caught off guard by the sudden and powerful forces of nature.

programme.title: Viral Wild
programme.desc: These birds are spreading their wings, with or without the ability to fly.

programme.title: Viral Wild
programme.desc: Dive deep into the shark infested waters all from the safety of your couch.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.desc: They're no strangers to natures extremes but Hurricanes Harvey and Irma test the Stormhunters.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.sub-title: Storm Hunters Height of Ruin - Part 1
programme.desc: George joins Mark and Jaclyn on a journey to Nepal.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: Host/adventurer George Kourounis explores the American Southwest during the Desert Monsoon. He ups the danger factor by traveling with wild atheist shock-jock R.J. Evans to track massive lightning storms which can produce bolts of up to one hundred million volts. The pair come close - too close - to dangerous electrical clouds swirling over Tucson, Sedona and Monument Valley.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: With summer wildfires overpowering the Yukon forests, host/adventurer George Kourounis follows the fabled route of the Klondike Gold Rush sourdoughs through the bawdy town of Skagway, Alaska, paddling the white water rivers and the White Horse Rapids into the Yukon. He travels on mountain bike, steam train and Cessna to experience the huge fires and meet the northern fire crews battling the blazes.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: George tracks twisters through the Tornado Alley and descends into the Erte Ale Volcano.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: George investigates the wild side of water in dangerous class 5 river rapids.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: Mount Washington, New Hampshire has the dubious title of being home to the worlds worst weather. The highest wind ever recorded on the planet 231 miles per hour was recorded at its mountaintop observatory. To prepare for a mid-winter assault on the summit, Angry Planet host George Kourounis becomes a human popsicle, encased in ice in at the National Resarch Councils high speed wind tunnel. Then he and his sidekick Mark Robinson climb to the top of the mountain in mid-January and brave their way into a summit blizzard.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: Dominica, the most volcanic and mountainous island in the Caribbean, is home to the Boiling Lake, a large waterfall-fed lake of furiously boiling water. Adventurer George Kourounis becomes the first person ever to traverse across the lake on a rope, risking his life to take water samples and shoot video from a place no human has ever been. He then dives to the ocean floor off the coast of the island to explore vents where the superheated water bubbles into the ocean.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: One of the most exciting episodes of season one is Wild Water our look at Great White Sharks, water-filled caves and high voltage marine action.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: We hope Season Two will give us the opportunity to make the quintessential Angry Planet show a full episode exploring a major hurricane that makes landfall in Florida or the Carolinas.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc finds himself taken captive by a psychotic nurse and her surviving mental patients, and he later discovers that 10K is being held too.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Seemingly injected with the blend vaccine, The Man attempts to kidnap Murphy but underestimates the strength of Murphy's followers. However, he does manage to learn about Lucy's existence. 10K reunites with the group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the others inspect Murphytown and realize they are going to need a bigger army to extract Murphy. Warren finds an old ally in El Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Upon finding Lucy, Doc and Addy work hard to stay alive and earn the family's trust. After a dangerous game of zombie hide-and-seek, an apocalyptic fairytale and a close call with an ender, Addy and Doc convince the family to follow them to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc tries to find a way to tell Warren about Lucy's kidnapping. In the meantime, he encounters a radio tower and castle-like compound inhabited by three attractive, crafty ladies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren leads an attack against Murphytown to extract its smug leader.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy and Doc catch up with Warren, but the reunion is short-lived as the group faces the biggest battle yet.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Two years later, things have gotten worse: Warren's apocalyptic dreams continue while the group fights MAD-Zs.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Driven by her dream of a black rainbow and flesh-eating rain, Warren and Murphy escape Zona, while Doc, 10K and Sarge are pinned down by snipers.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When Sun Mei and Red vanish, the group must decide whether to keep looking for them or press on to Newmerica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team is captured and enslaved in an elaborate underground facility, forced by their mysterious captors to perform a series of bizarre and dangerous tasks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lucy fights to save Murphy's life, while Warren and the others battle a biologically modified zombie.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Shaken by the death a groupmate, something snaps in Murphy. Warren is unable to stop him and the others from committing an atrocity as misplaced revenge.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group encounter a mysterious stranger who they think is a grave robber - but turns out to be something much more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group explores an abandoned TV station while seeking a way to contact Kaya, who is attempting to hide from an invasion of Zona forces at camp Northern Light. Citizen Z returns home after two years.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group returns to Mercy Labs, where they first met The Man, to retrieve another item from Warren's dreams.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: At Mount Weather, the group learns the thumb print of the president is necessary to achieve Warren's goal.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the mind-bending season finale, the team arrives in Washington, D.C. and the secret of Warren's dreams is revealed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following the drone crash, Warren is nursed back to health by attractive homesteader Cooper. Meanwhile, the others finally reach Newmerica, and Murphy goes his own way.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Panic and anti-talker sentiments flare after an explosion derails the vote - and rumors blame a talker. 10K, Sarge and Red are attacked by old-school zombies and suffer devastating losses, and Murphy finds his loyal blends are still out there.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: 10K and Red attend a ceremony for those lost in Altura. Warren, Doc, Citizen Z and George arrive in Pacifica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A new spate of terrorist bombings hit Pacifica. In order to follow his vision for human-talker unity, George seeks those responsible for the attacks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group wind up at a wild casino and shelter for fugitive talkers run by Murphy and his blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group arrives at the farming outpost that produces flour for Z-bizkuits, but it is overrun by zombies, Pandora and starving talkers laying in wait to kill them.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group is reunited with old Native friends who are defending a dam that controls Newmerica's water from talkers. In order to help, Doc and Warren undertake spiritual journeys.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group discovers Altura militia forces have enslaved talkers to mine hazardous waste for Z-bizkuits.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: With help from renegade hackers, Warren and George hack Altura's defenses and discover Estes' secret plan.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Estes imprisons the captive talkers and blends, while Warren and George plan their attack on Altura.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A team starts its journey transporting the only survivor of the zombie virus from New York to Los Angeles, CA.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of gas, the team follows a suspicious stranger to a damaged oil refinery deep inside a New Jersey no-go zone packed with zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Out to get Cassandra back, her bizarre and dangerous "family" of cannibals catches up with the team and kidnaps Addy, endangering the mission.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A tornado forces the team to Warren's hometown, where she searches for her husband who she lost track of in the early days of the apocalypse.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After taking refuge in a safe enclave where no weapons are allowed, the team finds itself thrust into a battle for control of the compound against a zombie-worshipping cult.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lost and out of water in rural Kansas, the team is on the verge of breaking up before arriving at a Wild West-style bar. Guns, liquor and a zombie-shooting contest: what could go wrong.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When the last surviving cosmonaut from the International Space Station crashes on Earth, Citizen Z gets a real, live buddy - but it quickly becomes clear that his new friend has a secret agenda.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While in South Dakota, an imminent meltdown forces the team to help the locals repair a nearby nuclear power plant full of radiated zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of shelter and supplies, the team seeks refuge in an all-female compound where men are not allowed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Some strangers earn their ways into the team, taking a keen interest in Murphy, but things take a deadly turn.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A change in plans has the team re-routed to a Colorado viral lab located in a nuclear missile silo. The team searches for Dr. Merch, the developer of the experimental vaccine previously given to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Each member of the group goes through a near-death experience while being attacked by bounty hunters. Mack is bitten after being caught in a zombie-infested stairwell.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After finally tracking down Murphy, the group comes across a caravan of survivors transporting victims of the nuclear blast to safety. Along the way, the mission is attacked by "blasters," zombies mutated by the radioactive fallout.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: On the quest for a cure for the virus, the group makes its way to the greenhouse where Batch 47 is being grown by Odegard. There, Odegard warns them about zombie-plant hybrids.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy's past comes back to haunt him when Serena tracks him down. The team stumbles upon a hidden farm.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy separates from the group out of fear that they may take the baby away - and kill her. Vasquez and Warren are injured and wind up in an abandoned hospital. 10K is forced to make a tragic decision during a conflict with Cassandra.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Tricked into a trap by use of a fresh brain lure, Murphy is captured by a zombie fan known as "The Collector.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near Roswell, New Mexico, the group encounters a community, led by a woman called Bernadette, which they believe is above a secret underground base that may contain useful equipment.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy, Warren, Vasquez and Addy find themselves at a casino while 10K and Doc are captured by Natives.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group becomes embroiled in corporate politics while seeking shelter at a hotel overtaken by white-collar survivors. There, Murphy is hunted.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose when it's discovered that not only does Dr. Kurian's vaccine not work but everyone who was injected will come under Murphy's control after an incubation period.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team finally arrives in California. As they near their goal, each member thinks back to where they were at the beginning of the apocalypse and what it took to get where they are today.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, the team drives through the abandoned city to the coordinates of the mobile CDC lab provided by Citizen Z. There, they discover the lab isn't just a lab - it's a submarine.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 1.

programme.desc: Warren and the group are taken prisoner while Murphy manages to escape with his newly formed group of blends.

programme.desc: Following the drone crash, Warren is nursed back to health by attractive homesteader Cooper. Meanwhile, the others finally reach Newmerica, and Murphy goes his own way.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the outpost Altura, 10K searches for Red, Warren discovers George is an old friend, Murphy encounters Sun Mei in her new lab and Doc runs into Citizen Z.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Panic and anti-talker sentiments flare after an explosion derails the vote - and rumors blame a talker. 10K, Sarge and Red are attacked by old-school zombies and suffer devastating losses, and Murphy finds his loyal blends are still out there.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: 10K and Red attend a ceremony for those lost in Altura. Warren, Doc, Citizen Z and George arrive in Pacifica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group wind up at a wild casino and shelter for fugitive talkers run by Murphy and his blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc breaks out special medicine to treat George's injury and explains the Founding Fathers, the Bill of Rights and more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group arrives at the farming outpost that produces flour for Z-bizkuits, but it is overrun by zombies, Pandora and starving talkers laying in wait to kill them.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group is reunited with old Native friends who are defending a dam that controls Newmerica's water from talkers. In order to help, Doc and Warren undertake spiritual journeys.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group discovers Altura militia forces have enslaved talkers to mine hazardous waste for Z-bizkuits.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Estes imprisons the captive talkers and blends, while Warren and George plan their attack on Altura.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren works with humans, talkers and blends to help George defeat Estes and Pandora. Newmericans can finally vote, but before Warren can relax, Cooper reappears with a shocking revelation.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A team starts its journey transporting the only survivor of the zombie virus from New York to Los Angeles, CA.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Out to get Cassandra back, her bizarre and dangerous "family" of cannibals catches up with the team and kidnaps Addy, endangering the mission.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Citizen Z directs the team to a rumored helicopter controlled by a mysterious general living atop a heavily guarded skyscraper - where zombies roam freely.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A tornado forces the team to Warren's hometown, where she searches for her husband who she lost track of in the early days of the apocalypse.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After taking refuge in a safe enclave where no weapons are allowed, the team finds itself thrust into a battle for control of the compound against a zombie-worshipping cult.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lost and out of water in rural Kansas, the team is on the verge of breaking up before arriving at a Wild West-style bar. Guns, liquor and a zombie-shooting contest: what could go wrong.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Split off from the others, Mack and Addy find themselves trapped by a zombie they just can't kill. A series of escalating fights forces them to confront an ugly truth hidden in their past.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While in South Dakota, an imminent meltdown forces the team to help the locals repair a nearby nuclear power plant full of radiated zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of shelter and supplies, the team seeks refuge in an all-female compound where men are not allowed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A change in plans has the team re-routed to a Colorado viral lab located in a nuclear missile silo. The team searches for Dr. Merch, the developer of the experimental vaccine previously given to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Picking up moments after the launch of the tactical nuclear weapons, the team is split up trying to outrun the impending blast. Citizen Z finds himself battling thawed zombies, ultimately issuing an on-air bounty for Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Each member of the group goes through a near-death experience while being attacked by bounty hunters. Mack is bitten after being caught in a zombie-infested stairwell.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After finally tracking down Murphy, the group comes across a caravan of survivors transporting victims of the nuclear blast to safety. Along the way, the mission is attacked by "blasters," zombies mutated by the radioactive fallout.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: On the quest for a cure for the virus, the group makes its way to the greenhouse where Batch 47 is being grown by Odegard. There, Odegard warns them about zombie-plant hybrids.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy separates from the group out of fear that they may take the baby away - and kill her. Vasquez and Warren are injured and wind up in an abandoned hospital. 10K is forced to make a tragic decision during a conflict with Cassandra.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While crossing the Mississippi River, the group is involved in an accident and 10K is separated. At a nearby settlement, 10K and some new friends run into trouble with the settlement's leader, Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Tricked into a trap by use of a fresh brain lure, Murphy is captured by a zombie fan known as "The Collector.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near Roswell, New Mexico, the group encounters a community, led by a woman called Bernadette, which they believe is above a secret underground base that may contain useful equipment.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group becomes embroiled in corporate politics while seeking shelter at a hotel overtaken by white-collar survivors. There, Murphy is hunted.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near the Mexican border, the group is rescued from a zombie hoard by Escorpion, who leads them to La Reina, the "Queen of the Dead." As a bounty for Murphy, La Reina offers them a reward or a free pass to join her group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose when it's discovered that not only does Dr. Kurian's vaccine not work but everyone who was injected will come under Murphy's control after an incubation period.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team finally arrives in California. As they near their goal, each member thinks back to where they were at the beginning of the apocalypse and what it took to get where they are today.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 1.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.desc: Arjun spends time with Preeta and the Aroras. When he returns home, Anjali overhears him confessing his feelings for Preeta alone in the car.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities.

programme.title: The Good Son
programme.desc: Raja Beta is an Indian television drama series that revolves around the life of Vedant Tripathi, an ideal and dutiful son. Vedant is adopted by the Tripathi family and grows up to become a successful gynecologist. Despite facing challenges and prejudice due to his adopted status, he wins the love and respect of his family through his unwavering dedication, kindness, and sense of responsibility.

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Untangled
programme.desc: Diya, a gully badminton player, meets Arjun, a former badminton champ from an affluent family, who resents his own kin. Will Diya bring back the much-needed positivity and hope in Arujns life.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Dholi Beats
programme.desc: The story revolves around Geet, a young woman who follows her father's footsteps as a dhol player, challenging societal norms about gender roles in music. Her journey is supported by her husband, Malhar, who helps her pursue her dreams.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.
